revision.text: '''{{struct|LevelLocals}}''' {{c|VisualThinker '''SpawnVisualThinker''' (Class ''type'')}} == Usage == A {{struct|LevelLocals}} function to spawn a [[VisualThinker]]. Returns a pointer to the spawned VisualThinker. This function can be called globally using the level [[ZScript global variables|global pointer]], for example: level.SpawnVisualThinker('MyVisualThinker'). === Parameters === * {{c|Class '''type'''}} : The class type to spawn. The class must be based on [[VisualThinker]]. === Return values === Returns a pointer to the spawned VisualThinker instance, which can then be modified. == See also == * [[Classes:VisualThinker]] * [[Structs:LevelLocals]] [[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:LevelLocals]]
